Batch download MODIS Land Products subsets

Source: R/mt_batch_subset.R
mt_batch_subset.Rd

Lists all available dates for a MODIS Land Products Subset product at a particular location.

mt_batch_subset(df = NULL, product = NULL, band = NULL,
  start = "2000-01-01", end = format(Sys.time(), "%Y-%m-%d"),
  km_lr = 0, km_ab = 0, out_dir = tempdir(), internal = TRUE,
  ncores = "auto")

Arguments

df

a file holding locations and their sitenames to batch process
product

a valid MODIS product name
band

band to download (default = NULL, all bands)
start

start date
end

end date
km_lr

km left-right to sample
km_ab

km above-below to sample
out_dir

location where to store all data
internal

should the data be returned as an internal data structure TRUE or FALSE (default = TRUE)
ncores

number of cores to use while downloading in parallel (auto will select the all cpu cores - 1)

Value

A nested list containing the downloaded data and a descriptive header with meta-data.

Examples



# create data frame with a site_name, lat and lon column
# holding the respective names of sites and their location
df <- data.frame("site_name" = paste("test",1:2))
df$lat <- 40
df$lon <- -110

print(df)
#>   site_name lat  lon
#> 1    test 1  40 -110
#> 2    test 2  40 -110

# test batch download
subsets <- mt_batch_subset(df = df,
                        product = "MOD11A2",
                        band = "LST_Day_1km",
                        internal = TRUE,
                        start = "2004-01-01",
                        end = "2004-03-31",
                        out_dir = "~")

print(str(subsets))
#> List of 2
#>  $ test 1:List of 2
#>   ..$ header:List of 15
#>   .. ..$ xllcorner: chr "-9370036.39"
#>   .. ..$ yllcorner: chr "4447802.08"
#>   .. ..$ cellsize : chr "926.625433055834"
#>   .. ..$ nrows    : int 1
#>   .. ..$ ncols    : int 1

#>   .. ..$ units    : chr "Kelvin"
